name: One-Arm Dumbbell Row (Bench Supported)
cues: Place one knee and hand on a bench, keeping your spine neutral
Hold a dumbbell in the other hand, arm extended toward the floor
Row the dumbbell up to your ribcage, keeping your elbow close to your body
Lower slowly and fully extend your arm without twisting your torso
Brace your core and avoid shrugging your shoulder
Keep your back flat and avoid rotating your torso
Focus on squeezing your back muscles at the top
Use a weight that allows full range of motion
variations: Use a kettlebell or ruck instead of a dumbbell
